Translations.Text: He is the One who takes you at night (during sleep) and knows what you did during the day, then He raises you in it until a limited time is finished, then your return is to Him, then He informs you of what you were doing
He is dominant over His servants, and He sends guardians for you until when the death comes to one of you and Our messengers (angels) take him back, and they do not fall short
Then they are returned to God, their true protector/master. Know that the command (and making rules) belongs to Him and He is the quickest of the accountants
Say: who saves you from darkness of the land and the sea when you call on him humbly and secretly, (saying) if you save us from this, we will be of the thankful
Say: God saves you from it and from every distress, yet you associate (partners with Him)

Say: He is able to raise a punishment against you from above you or from under your feet or to tangle you in sects and to make you taste each otherâ€™s violence. See how We explain the signs so they may understand
And your people denied it (Quran) while it is the truth, say: I am not your advocate
For all news there is a settlement, and you will know (when it happens)

And when you see those who enter into (confusing/useless/false or mocking) discussion about Our signs, then stay away from them until they enter into a conversation other than it. And if Satan makes you forget, then do not sit with the wrongdoing people after remembering
